text: The Little Giant is a 1933 American crime comedy movie directed by Roy Del Ruth and starring Edward G. Robinson, Mary Astor, Helen Vinson, Russell Hopton, Kenneth Thomson, Shirley Grey, Berton Churchill, Donald Dillaway. It was distributed by Warner Bros. ==Other websites== * * Category:1933 comedy movies Category:1930s crime movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Roy Del Ruth
title: The Little Giant (1933 movie)
